reserve_circulation_rules.14DYNORENU: Circulates for 14 days with fees, no renewals
reserve_circulation_rules.24HOUR: Circulates for 24 hours with no fees
reserve_circulation_rules.28ONERENU: Circulates for 28 days with one renewal
reserve_circulation_rules.3DAYEQUIP: Equipment circulates for 3 days with $25/day fees
reserve_circulation_rules.4WEEK: Circulates for 28 days, Community borrowers/Non-resident PA
reserve_circulation_rules.4WKRESIDNT: Circulates for 28 days, Resident PA users
reserve_circulation_rules.5DAYEQUIP: Equipment circulates for 5 days with $3/day overdue
reserve_circulation_rules.7DAYEQUIP: Equipment circulates for 7 days with $5/day overdue
reserve_circulation_rules.FASTSEMEST: Circulates for a semester with unlimited renewals
reserve_circulation_rules.LAPTOPPAT: Circulates for 7 days with fees, no renewals, no recalls
reserve_circulation_rules.RES-24HRTE: Reserve - 24 hour loan, no renewals, overdue fee, 2hr grace
